column1: back of a length, angling in from wide of the crease, bouncing and seaming away outside off. Hafeez lets it go. He gestures to Fakhar that the ball moved away
shorter and outside off, Hafeez rides it out to backward point with soft hands

Stanlake strikes with his third ball and has Hafeez nicking off for a duck. Australia's beanpole fast bowler runs in hard, hits the deck hard, and finds extra bounce. It fizzes from a back of a length, the line is outside off, hint of away movement, Hafeez simply spars at it and edges it to first slip, where Finch completes a sharp overhead catch
much fuller and angling across off, Talat stretches out and carves a drive to backward point
back of a length and skidding through on off stump, Talat hangs back and jams it out
much fuller and angling away wide outside off, Talat throws his hands at the ball and stabs it away to deep third man. Excellent start from Stanlake

he draws an lbw appeal right away. Umpire Tiffin shoots down the appeal, though. Inswinging yorker, Talat camps back and is pinned on the pad. It pitched in line and might have crashed into leg stump but umpire Tiffin wasn't interested
dug in short on leg stump, this is more a short-arm flap than a short-arm pull. Hit in the air but wide of midwicket
here comes Talat: down the track, takes it on a half-volley outside off and belts it through the covers. There's no stopping that
hurled short and angling across off, Talat looks to ramp it over slip. No contact in the end
pretty full on middle and leg, squeezed square on the leg side for one
full and angling away outside off, drags an inside edge behind square on the leg side
very full and wide outside off, Zaman stays leg-side of the ball and flashes it straight to mid-off
dragged short on off, Zaman camps on the back foot and swats it straight to midwicket
good length and tucks up the batsman for room, jabbed to the covers for a speedy single
chest-high short ball on leg stump, cramps the batsman for room again, and pings the body. Fiery pace and bounce from Stanlake

One-hander from Finch, running across from first slip and pulling off a stunner at where gully may have been. Another lifter outside off, Talat rises with it and aims to fend it away. Steep bounce for Stanlake. The ball balloons off the glove. Finch runs across to his left, stretches out one hand and sends back Talat
too full and straight, Sarfraz sits back, perhaps waiting for the short one, and clips it neatly through square leg
back of a length and outside off, punched through the line to mid-off
short and on middle, no room for the batsman to free his arms, jabbed back to the bowler
back of a length on middle and leg, punched back to Richardson again
full and angling away outside off, Zaman likes it there. He stays leg-side of the ball and blazes it through the covers. He doesn't move his feet much muscles it away
short on middle, backs away and stabs it straight to backward point
Zaman ventures outside leg and aims to cut it on the up over backward point. But this short ball beats him for pace and bounce
on a length and just a shade outside off, bunted back to Stanlake off the front foot
Sarfraz rides the bounce of a short ball outside off and secures a single to deep third man

Has Zaman been strangled down the leg side? Umpire Jeremiah Matibiri raises his finger. Zaman doesn't seem pleased but no DRS in this series to challenge the on-field out decision. Dug in down the leg side, rushes Zaman into a hook. There's a deflection - not sure if it was off the glove or bat - but Zaman has to exit. Three wickets in three overs for Stanlake
welcomes Malik to the crease with a bouncer, he sways out of the way
Malik gets on top of a short ball outside off and punches to backward point
dug in short on a fourth-stump line, Malik hops, skips and fends if away to the off side
goes back nudges it off his hips for a quick single at short fine leg
keeps cramping the right-handers for room as Malik shifts back and flicks to midwicket
waits a touch longer - and is helped by the ball coming up only about knee-high - to send the ball hurtling to deep backward square leg
blocks a good length ball on and around off stump. Malik plays it with such soft hands that the ball almost rolls onto his stumps!
opens the face to punch the back of a length delivery to cover point
works a shortish delivery on off stump to midwicket and pinches the single.
short and wide outside off, Malik gets on top of the bounce and slaps it away to sweeper cover

Four wickets in four overs for Stanlake. Credit to Finch for giving him four overs on the bounce with the new ball. Stanlake's USP: extra bounce comes to the fore again. Bursts from a back of a length just outside off, seams away, Sarfraz is squared up; he looks to fend it away but ends up nicking it behind to Finch at slip. Finch dives to his right and takes it with both hands
bouncer, too high, wide called
much fuller on off now, Asif keeps it out
back of a length and angling into middle, pushed back to the bowler
wide of the crease, short and holds its line outside off, run down to deep third man for one
Stanlake hits a hard length outside off - neither driveable nor pullable - jabbed to the covers. Stanlake ends with 4-0-8-4 What a spell from him
back of a length and nipping in to take the inside edge and roll away to the leg side
slower knuckle ball outside off, waits for the ball to arrive and helps it to third man

the umpire and the non-striker are in the firing line. The umpire swerves away but Malik cops a blow. He wrings his gloves in pain. On a length and outside off, drilled straight past the bowler. Malik is in pain. He needs some medical attention
Malik leans back and punches this short ball from outside off to the right of deep third man
full and slanting away outside off past the outside edge
slower cutter outside off, guided to third man for one
full and angling into middle and leg, driven down to long-on
back of a length and breaks away outside off, firmly punched through the cover-point region off the back foot
skids in on middle, tip and run to short cover. The fielder swoops down on the ball and effects a direct hit at the non-striker's end but Asif Ali slides his bat in
tossed up outside off and spins away, Malik searches for the cover drive, but ends up slicing it away fine of short third man for four
flighted on off, Malik leans into a drive and sends the ball along the ground to long-off
lobbed up on off, non-turning full ball, Asif Ali gets underneath the length and hoists it over the bowler's head for the first six of the day
picked off the pads through square leg
good length on middle and leg, worked to midwicket
full and skidding into catch the pad as the batsman does not connect with a leg-side flick

short and angling into the hips, short-armed away to deep square leg. There's a horrible mix-up between the wickets, the last thing Pakistan wanted now. There's two on offer. Asif wants two, Malik isn't interested. Maddinson slides, gathers the ball, and throws it to the keeper to catch Malik short
bouncer on middle, beats the hook and slides down leg for a wide
full and outside off, drives and edges it to third man
full on the stumps, eased down to long-on for one
pushes a good length ball on middle towards cover point
gets forward to knock a fuller delivery to the right of midwicket
gets down low to sweep a tossed up delivery on middle and leg to long leg
hangs back but the ball takes an age to arrive, messing with his timing. Eventually, Shadab taps it through cover
quicker delivery, targeting the base of off stump, Shadab steers it through cover again
lunges forward to ease the length delivery on off stump to cover
launches a short ball clean out of the ground! Ample room to swing the arms and Asif Ali takes full toll. The ball disappears over long-on
back of a length and cramping him for room. Asif short-arm pulls to midwicket

misreads the length and pays the price! This is not short enough to play a cross-bat shot. But that's what he does, looking to pull the quick, skiddy delivery through square leg. The reasonably good length ball zips through his defences and takes out off stump
turns a fullish delivery to short midwicket

shortish and outside off, he punches to point and sets off for a quick single. The throw comes into the bowler's end, from Aaron Finch, but the man backing up, Travis Head, doesn't do well and gives up an overthrow
too quick for Ashraf as he cuts and misses outside off
shifts back and flicks a good length ball angled across the right-hander from around the wicket through midwicket
full on off stump, pats it to point
nudges a slow, tossed up delivery on leg stump to backward square leg
he's looking to flick a ball from outside off to midwicket again. But Maxwell's fuller length doesn't allow it
shimmies down the pitch for a push to long-on
flicks a shortish delivery off the hips to short fine leg
gets it to drift in nicely to middle and leg and that's why Shadab is tentative with his defence
a shorter delivery allows the batsman to rock back and cut to the sweeper
opens the face and slices the fuller delivery outside off to backward point
seeing the length ball drifting into the pads, Agar goes down to sweep, but he doesn't have enough room to properly free the arms
goes onto the back foot to knock the quicker flatter delivery to midwicket
works it to midwicket again
a back of a length delivery holds up in the pitch and makes Shadab look very awkward as he tries to flick to the leg side. Suffers a leading edge, but it lands safely at cover
whips a fuller delivery to midwicket
defends a good length ball to cover
launches it over deep square leg! Stoinis goes short and here he offers room for the left-hander to free the arms. And Ashraf absolutely loves it
another lovely shot! Straight down the ground! This is a fuller delivery, which Ashraf probably expects after bulldozing that last short ball. Strides easily forward and lifts it over mid-off
pure elegance! After caning the ball out of the park, he shows he has the finesse to hit it all along the ground too. A pristine cover drive, his front foot moving towards the ball quite gleefully
steps out to drive a tossed up delivery to long-off
defends a good length ball behind point and they take on Finch's arm. It's risky... but Shadab puts his head down and keeps running full tilt
steers it in front of point
works a shortish delivery off the pads through midwicket
stays les side of a flighted delivery on middle and lashes it to the left of long-off
taps a shortish delivery gently and to the right of the pitch
back of a length and sliding into the hips, neatly glanced to fine leg
back of a length and angling in towards middle stump, tip and run to the covers

Richardson bounces out Ashraf. Chest-high short ball angling across off stump from over the wicket, rushes the batsman into a hook. He only top-edges it hiiiiiiigh in the air. It drops down into the lap of Tye at fine leg
short and angling into the body, shuffles across off and flaps it away to midwicket
full and attacking middle stump, Nawaz is pinned to the crease as he limply pokes it back to the bowler
bouncer on middle, ducks under it safely
back of a length and some width outside off, cracked off the back foot to the off-side sweeper for one
low full-toss on middle stump, driven back to the bowler, the ball bursts through the hands and rolls down to long-on
slower ball, full and wide outside off, Shadab picks the change-up. Waits for the knuckle ball to arrive and then smites it over the covers
wide yorker, nice comeback from Tye, jammed to long-off
another knuckle ball, jabbed from outside off through midwicket
seam-up, full and wide outside off, driven off the inside half to long-on
full and wide outside off, past the reach of the batsman
slower full-toss outside off, Nawaz swings waaaaay too early... and misses
really full and outside off, squeezed to the covers
backs away and punches a shortish ball to point
back-of-the-hand slower ball but floated past the tramline, off-side wide
Dropped by Stoinis running in from long-on. On a length and outside off, Nawaz clears his front leg and swipes it in the air. Stoinis misjudges it and shells it with the sun squinting into his eyes
slower yorker, wide outside off, sneaks under the bat. Good finish from Richardson
pitched up and outside off, Shadab stays leg-side of the ball, reaches out for the ball with his hands and sends the ball soaring over the covers with a clean swing

full and wide outside off again, Shadab is happy to stay leg-side of the ball, again, but this is a slower one and the batsman toe-ends a catch to cover. Shadab has given Pakistan something to bowl at. Head dives forward and makes a tough catch look easy
leg-stump yorker, dug out through the off side for one
off-side wide
full-toss, wide outside off, Hasan Ali throws his bat at the ball and smears it straight to deep point. He holes out for a duck on his 24th birthday

Tye wraps Pakistan up for 116! Very full on middle and leg, not quite a yorker, Nawaz gets under the length. He swings, gets more height as opposed to distance. Agar sprints in from long-on, dives forward, and snaffles it
attempted short ball, wide outside off, but does not bounce as much as Short expected as sneaks under the bat
short and angling in on middle from over the wicket, Short stands tall and punchily defends it back to the bowler
full and slanting in on off from over the wicket, inside-edged onto the pad. The ball rolls away towards point, Short gets off the mark
back of a length and angling away outside off, swish and a miss from Finch. Off-side wide
full and angling across off, scoops a drive to mid-off
on a length and slanting away outside off, tip and run to mid-on

full inducker from Usman Khan, starts outside off, swerves back in, catches the batsman on the crease and hits the pad but this might have been heading down with the sharp angle from over the wicket and the seam movement to boot
full and angling into middle and leg, whipped in the air to deep square leg
good length, starts on middle and breaks down leg, leg-side wide
back of a length and skids on outside off, Short hangs back and turns the ball to the leg side
fuller and drifts away outside off, much slower through the air. Short stretches out and slices a drive to point
down the track, speared in at the pads, driven out to long-on
Finch tees off and launches this full ball angling into his pads into the stands beyond long-on. Such a smooth swing
another arm ball from Nawaz, finishes on the pads of Finch, who, having backed away outside leg, nails another six over long-on to close out the over with back-to-back sixes
full and angling in at off from over the wicket, squirted away to mid-off
on a length and outside off, Short takes it on the up and crunnnnnnches a drive through extra cover. Dismissive

this is even better! Usman Khan drags his length back and gets it to hold its line outside off. Short gets on top of the bounce and crisply punches it through the same region. Look at that high elbow and timing...
slower and fuller outside off, Pakistan continue to bleed runs, stretches out and drives it stylishly between covers and mid-off. Hat-trick of fours for Short
short and outside off, swivels on the back foot and pulls it away to deep square leg
back of a length and angling across off stump, Finch stands up tall and elegantly punches through the covers. Australia have already shaved 35 runs off the target
short and angling in from round the stumps, punched to midwicket

Hasan hands Pakistan the breakthrough. Hip-high short ball outside off, right in the slot to be thumped over short midwicket, instead Short weakly pulls it to Talat. Nice little birthday gift for Hasan
back of a length and bounces outside off to beat Head in the channel
full and sprayed down the leg side, past the flick, past the diving keeper
short, wide, Head frees his arms and hammers it away to the left of backward point and right of the covers. Rasping back-foot cut
steered down to third man from the stumps
full and angling into middle, forward and played back to Hasan
pushed through just a shade outside off, clipped away between deep midwicket and wide long-on
shorter and spins into the pads, tucked around the corner for one off the back foot
shortish and slides on outside off, punched through the line to mid-off
Finch backs away outside leg, Shadab darts in a short ball on middle, flaps a pull to long-on's right
deflected off the pads to short fine leg for one
shorter googly, spins back in, cramps Finch for room, stabbed back to Shadab
back of a length and angling into the hips, worked away between square leg and midwicket for one
full on middle, tip and run to point
dug in short and outside off, Finch picks up the length swiftly. He rocks back and launches a pull beyond the square-leg boundary. Cracking hit from Finch
slower offcutter outside off, Finch reaches out for the ball and forces it away to point
short and skidding into the body, cramps the batsman for room, pulls it weakly as the ball pops over midwicket
yorker on middle, squeezed back to the left of the bowler
back of a length and spins away outside off, Finch searches for the googly and plays the legbreak back to Shadab
wrong'un this time, full and spins in outside off, drags it with the turn over midwicket. Slog-swept away, splitting the two men in the deep on leg side
tossed outside off, breaks back in, picks another wrong'un and hoists it with the turn over the long-on boundary like a boss
Finch clears long-off now and fetches another six. This is a legbreak, full and spins away outside off, Finch gets under the length and smokes it away
Shadab holds this legbreak back. It dips, creating distance between the bat and the pitch. Finch has a loose waft at it and is beaten on the outside edge
full and holds its line outside off, forward and laced to the covers, where the fielder makes a diving stop to keep it to one
darted in on off, worked away to the leg side for one
uses his feet and works it with the turn to midwicket
Finch steps away outside leg, Nawaz fires it down leg side, the ball bursts out of Sarfraz's gloves
floated up outside off, Head ventures down the track but does not meet the pitch. He still goes through with the loft but ends up slicing it in the air and gets away
back of a length on middle, backs away and clubs a cut to backward point
clips an arm ball off his pads to square leg
back of a length on the stumps, forced down to long-on
tossed on middle, run away to point
short, wide, cracked to sweeper cover off the back foot
full on middle, dropped to short cover's left for one. Nawaz doesn't gather the ball cleanly
short and spins away outside off, lashed to sweeper again
uses his feet and nudges a legbreak wide of short fine leg for one more
another short legbreak, forced to the covers
punched on the up to sweeper cover
short and angling into the body, pulled away to long leg for three. Finch celebrates his fifty
Head shimmies out and clips a length ball from outside off to backward square leg
can't bowl down the leg side when you have fine leg inside the circle. Banged down leg, helped away fine of that fielder. Easy peasy
back of a length, pitches outside leg, skids off the pitch to catch the thigh. The ball rolls away to the third-man boundary
clipped off the pads to deep square's right
floated up and spins away, this wrong'un is dabbed away to short third man for one
wrong'un to right-hander, spins back in, squeezed away for one
clipped off the hips to square leg
tossed up outside off, right in Finch's swinging arc. He ventures outside leg and clubs a six over long-off

Shadab tosses a legbreak wide outside off, Finch muscles it away in the air against the turn. Asif Ali at long-on makes a mess of it and drops the catch. The ball plinks away to the boundary for four. Sums up Pakistan's day
